name: Swimming Pool Cliff Flip Diving Simulator 3D
name_original: Swimming Pool Cliff Flip Diving Simulator 3D
description:
Do you like sports games? These time you can join the realistic diving contest! Check Swimming Pool Cliff Flip Diving Simulator 3D!
Flip and whirl, earn points, collect awards and be ready to participate World Championship! Dive from the springboard to the pool – or to the ocean waters from the cliff - hurl, whirl, flip without leaving your room! Test your skills in different sports disciplines – plunging, fancy diving, and others, do your best and get the best results!
Your diver could be anyone – a pro athlete, old fart or even ordinary clerk – just choose the cliff do jump from it and dive without doubts and fear! Perform varies tricks and stunts during the jump – back dive, half twist, straight position! Try to perform all tricks without mistakes – do your best to earn maximum points! Use earned points to unlock new cliffs or other high places to jump down, new stunts and even new jumpers!
Wanna feel like a real sports diver? Perform tricks and stunts, earn points and have fun with our new diving simulator game - Swimming Pool Cliff Flip Diving Simulator 3D!
Swimming Pool Cliff Flip Diving Simulator 3D features:
Ultimate cliff-diving tournament simulator
Many stunts to perform - back dive, half twist, straight and other
Unlockable places to jump from it
Different jumpers – from pro athlete to ordinary old fart
